column4: anybody knows any way to downgrade my kernel to 2.6.17-7? 2.6.17-10 prevents my wireless card from working =/
your bootloader doesnt give you the option to boot with the older kernel?
when you boot up, it will ask you which kernel to use.. choose the one where your stuff works
i just had to reinstall edgy from the cd... the official release doesnt include 2.6.17-7. Only 2.6.17-10
aw
but from where? LOL ubuntu's archive does not include them anymore!
download the kernel source and compile it?
but then i miss the whole point about using a std kernel =//
